alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 20 at 3:18PM HST until January 21 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI... .A large to extra-large west-northwest (290-300 degrees) swell will peak tonight and early Sunday. Due to the westerly component of the swell, leeward Big Island and portions of leeward Maui County will be affected by the large swell. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Along west facing shores of Lanai, surf will rise to 8 to 12 feet late tonight and Sunday. * WHERE...Lanai Leeward. * WHEN...Through 6 PM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
